data.text: @hayaubsbs @AndySiminski @t0atiam @MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA Now that Dana said Islam was the one who turned down the fight you look stupid

@Daiyanism @AndySiminski @hayaubsbs @t0atiam @MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA All of what you said would be applicable if he didnt agree to fight at 170 right after… Are you suggesting trying to get your opponent to have a rough weight cut is equal to running? The moment he accepted 170 thats the last thing on the table? How can you think you have a point
@MortyMMA @MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA Did you see the last fight? He did not even warm up with Bobby green. So he is hungry for a real fight.
@MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA We as fans would love this one!
@Brock465 @KidoLFC8 @Givebackmy @MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA And hes the 2nd most accurate striker in lw division
@MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA Islam is going after all of them

@MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA I knew RDA didn’t want to get his ass kicked.        
“Verbal agreements are in place for Renato Moicano to face former champ Rafael dos Anjos this Saturday. That’s 5️⃣ rounds on 4️⃣ days notice. 🇧🇷”
@MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA Islam is the next light weight champion
@MMAJunkie @MAKHACHEVMMA @RdosAnjosMMA What's the "unfinished business"? Article doesn't mention the history between RDA and Makhachev
